label: 中将
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: a mid-level commander in the Left or Right Inner Palace Guards (Konoefu), who frequently held a concurrent appointment as a commander of yet another guard unit as well. The post of chûjô was often held by an advisor (sangi) on the Council of State. [参議]
